languages.text: "Ой, как славно, ваш-благородие! Как славно! Сразу видно настоящ{mf|его|ую} аристократ{mf|а|ку}, не то, что этот хмырь-комендант! Так вот, ваш-благородие, о чем бишь я..."
"Oh, that's so great to hear, Yer Nobleness! Just great! Now there's a true aristocrat, not that warden creep! Now then, Yer Nobleness, where was I...?"
languages.original_text: "Ой, как славно, ваш-благородие! Как славно! Сразу видно настоящ{mf|его|ую} аристократ{mf|а|ку}, не то, что этот хмырь-комендант! Так вот, ваш-благородие, о чем бишь я..."

"Oh, that's so great to hear, Yer Nobleness! Just great! There's a true aristocrat, not that warden creep! Now then, Yer Nobleness, where was I..."

"Oh, that's so great to hear, Yer Nobleness! Just great! Now there's a true aristocrat, not that warden creep! Now then, Yer Nobleness, where was I...?"

languages.text: «Oh, ¡qué alegría escuchar eso, Su Nobleza! ¡Es estupendo! Usted sí que es {mf|un auténtico|una auténtica} aristócrata, ¡no como ese espeluznante alcaide! Y ahora, Su Nobleza, ¿por dónde iba?...».
languages.original_text: "Oh, that's so great to hear, Yer Nobleness! Just great! Now there's a true aristocrat, not that warden creep! Now then, Yer Nobleness, where was I...?"

traits.locale_text: «Oh, ¡qué alegría escuchar eso, Su Nobleza! ¡Es estupendo! Usted sí que es {mf|un auténtico|una auténtica} aristócrata, ¡no como ese espeluznante alcaide! Y ahora, Su Nobleza, ¿por dónde iba?...».

languages.text: "Oh, das freut mich zu hören, Euer Erhabenheit! Wunderbar, ganz großartig! Das ist mal ein wahrer Aristokrat, nicht dieser gruselige Direktor! Also, Euer Erhabenheit, wo war ich ...?"
languages.original_text: "Oh, that's so great to hear, Yer Nobleness! Just great! Now there's a true aristocrat, not that warden creep! Now then, Yer Nobleness, where was I...?"

traits.locale_text: "Oh, das freut mich zu hören, Euer Erhabenheit! Wunderbar, ganz großartig! Das ist mal ein wahrer Aristokrat, nicht dieser gruselige Direktor! Also, Euer Erhabenheit, wo war ich ...?"

languages.text: « Oh, alors ça, c'est une excellente nouvelle, Votre Noblesse ! Vraiment parfaite ! Ça, c'est ce que j'appelle {mf|un vrai|une vraie} aristocrate, pas comme ce pouilleux de directeur ! Bien, alors, Votre Noblesse... Où j'en étais ? »
languages.original_text: "Oh, that's so great to hear, Yer Nobleness! Just great! Now there's a true aristocrat, not that warden creep! Now then, Yer Nobleness, where was I...?"

traits.locale_text: « Oh, alors ça, c'est une excellente nouvelle, Votre Noblesse ! Vraiment parfaite ! Ça, c'est ce que j'appelle {mf|un vrai|une vraie} aristocrate, pas comme ce pouilleux de directeur ! Bien, alors, Votre Noblesse... Où j'en étais ? »

languages.text: “噢，这真是太好了，大人！太好了！您和那个变态的典狱长可不一样，您这才是真正的贵族！那么，大人，我刚刚说什么来着……？”
languages.original_text: "Oh, that's so great to hear, Yer Nobleness! Just great! Now there's a true aristocrat, not that warden creep! Now then, Yer Nobleness, where was I...?"

traits.locale_text: “噢，这真是太好了，大人！太好了！您和那个变态的典狱长可不一样，您这才是真正的贵族！那么，大人，我刚刚说什么来着……”

languages.text: 「おお、本当に嬉しいぜ、貴族様！素晴らしいよ！あの気味の悪い所長とは違う、本物の高貴なお方がいらっしゃる！さて貴族様、俺はどこまで話したっけ…」
languages.original_text: "Oh, that's so great to hear, Yer Nobleness! Just great! Now there's a true aristocrat, not that warden creep! Now then, Yer Nobleness, where was I...?"

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、なんて嬉しいお言葉だろう、貴族様！シンプルに喜ばしい！あの変人所長とは違う、本物の高貴なお方がいらっしゃる！さて、貴族様、俺は…」
「おお、本当に嬉しいぜ、貴族様！素晴らしいよ！あの気味の悪い所長とは違う、本物の高貴なお方がいらっしゃる！さて貴族様、俺はどこまで話したっけ…」

languages.text: "Bunu duymak harika soylu hazretleri! Gerçekten harika! İşte gerçek bir aristokrat, rezil müdür gibi değil! Şey, nerede kalmıştım soylu hazretleri?"
languages.original_text: "Oh, that's so great to hear, Yer Nobleness! Just great! Now there's a true aristocrat, not that warden creep! Now then, Yer Nobleness, where was I...?"

traits.locale_text: "Bunu duymak harika soylu hazretleri! Gerçekten harika! İşte gerçek bir aristokrat, rezil müdür gibi değil! Şey, nerede kalmıştım soylu hazretleri?"
